title: STEM Problem-Solving Project Utilizing Citizen Science Data

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical and statistical knowledge, data interpretation experience, and fundamental understanding of SDGs (Sustainable Development Goals)
context.additional_context: A process applying citizen science project data for real-world problem-solving to mathematical modeling.

learning_goals: Processing data collected from citizen science projects using mathematical analysis tools to perform meaningful statistical inference.
Defining real-world problems linked to one or more SDGs and proposing solutions through mathematical modeling.
Utilizing collaboratively designed digital tools (filters/graphs/map functions) to visualize and interpret scientific data.

resources: Citizen Science Project Database Access Permissions

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
